description.value:
• Look: Your fur falls into orange shades.
  • Fire Resistance: You are resistant to fire damage.
  • Spirit Casting: You can cast the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.58I1UTE8ZV4CJ5W6]{Adherent Ember} cantrip at will. The embers created by the spell float near your tail until used. At 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.7UWC00HNXCOL4GFI]{Fireball} spell once per long rest.
    You can use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence as your spellcasting attribute when casting spells this way.
    If you are a spellcaster, you can also add these spells to your spell list. They are always prepared and do not count against the spells you can prepare each day.
  • Element Flail: Of all parts of a Zhier, the tail is the point most connected to its spirit element. You can swing your tail like a natural weapon flail. This weapon has both the Light and Finesse properties, and deals 1d4 fire damage as it sears the point of collision.
